hera_list_devices.description: List all devices registered to home automation server

hera_describe_device.description: Create a description for the requested device, including supported actions list

device.description: The unique ID or name of the device to be described

hera_read_temperature.description: Reads the current temperature value for the requested zone

zone.description: Name of the zone for which the temperature value is checked

hera_read_humidity.description: Reads the current humidity value for the requested zone

zone.description: Name of the zone for which the humidity value is checked

hera_read_all_sensors.description: Get the current readings from all sensors registered with the home automation system

hera_read_sensors_from_zone.description: Get the current readings from sensors from requested zone

zone.description: The name of the zone to retrieve sensors data from

hera_start_heating.description: Activates the central heating system to begin warming the home

hera_stop_heating.description: Completely disables the central heating system, halting all heating operations

hera_get_heating_state.description: Retrieves the current state of the central heating system

hera_run_device_diagnose.description: Check that a device is online and running properly, and return a diagnose report

device.description: The unique ID or name of the device to be diagnosed

hera_run_system_diagnose.description: Check home automation system by running a system diagnosis on all components and return a status report
